title: Pixel 4a battery drain
content:
in my new pixel 4a capture around 40 image mix night,portrait,normal it consum 7% of battery 


Then click 20 image 4 night sights , 6 normal and 10 potrait it consume 3% of battery 


Then shoot 4min 4k video and it took 3% battery


Then I just open the camera app open selfie camera for 5min nothing do no phone no video nothing but it consume 2% battery and get sitly heating


It is normal or there is some fault in my
